bibl.title: Religions and Politics in the Hellenistic and Roman Periods
bibl.note: Parente Fausto, Bibliography of the Writings of Elias Joseph Bickerman.
Elias J. Bickerman, Emilio Gabba and Morton Smith (Edd.), Religions and Politics in the Hellenistic and Roman Periods = Biblioteca di Athenaeum. 5 (Como, 1985) pp. XIII-XXXVII.
